name: sql
body:
###OPERATE the DB,,
###==>>select/delete/update/insert data from tables
###as a programmer,u do OPERATE the DB,,
###==>>select/delete/update/insert data from tables
###u operate the tables. [not design it.]

1.one table, select/delete/update/insert, nothing hard..

2.Many Tables,[use join],many tables to get Data,,is the Key in SQL..


[Learn SQL ==>> w3schools.com](http://www.w3schools.com/sql/)
